snippet.title: Tormentor X Punisher GAMEPLAY trailer
snippet.description:
http://tormentorxpunisher.com/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/500670/
https://Discord.gg/RawFury

Tormentor X Punisher is a brutal, top-down twin stick shooter where the goal is to survive and get the highest of scores. 

One hit, one kill to end them all, including yourself. Kill, destroy, fuck up demons, rack up combos, get upgrades for unique kills, and survive the onslaught from the brutal vile bosses.

Fire your machine gun and reload by firing your shotgun. Yeah, you read that right. 

Got it? Good. Let's fucking do this!
